name: Caverns of Fate
description:
Credits and Resources used

We used https://adamatomic.itch.io/cavernas for the level tileset. 

We used https://rvros.itch.io/animated-pixel-hero for the player character.

The backgrounds, and character portraits were made by https://jon11888.itch.io/ using Artbreeder

The music was made by https://philah15.itch.io/ with Beepbox

Souds were made by https://philah15.itch.io/ using Jsfxr

All the programming and work done in Godot was done by https://kilean-eothiya.itch.io/

Level design and game design were done by https://jon11888.itch.io/

Playtesting, Writing/Dialogue and sound design were done by https://philah15.itch.io/
